ApproxsimClient.map
Class Region

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.Region
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimEventListener
public class Region
extends Object
implements ApproxsimEventListener

Region defined by Shape objects.

          Creates geographical region.
